summary: Room management UI: remove manual add-room button, show room icons based on selected room count, and navigate to a room details page with stats (usage/consumption/devices) when a room is selected.

existing_features.title: Remove the manual "Add Room" UI and creation flow from the Rooms page so rooms are no longer created via an "Add Room" button/dialog. The Rooms page must not render the Add Room button in the header and must not show an empty-state that prompts creating the first room.

Update the Rooms page "number of rooms" selector behavior so that selecting a room count displays exactly that many room icons/cards in the grid, derived from the pre-created rooms (IDs 1â€“100). The displayed rooms must be consistent with the selected count and update immediately when the count changes.

Implement navigation to a dedicated Room Details screen when the user clicks a room icon/card in the Rooms grid. The Room Details screen must be a separate page-level view (not an inline swap inside the Rooms page) and must show: room details, room statistics, room electricity/consumption section, and the room's devices list/controls (reusing existing Room Dashboard functionality where applicable). Include a Back control to return to the Rooms page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the 'Add Room' button; rooms should be determined by selected room count instead of manual adding.
When the user selects the number of rooms, display a corresponding number of room icons/cards in the UI.
On tapping a room icon/card, navigate to a new Room Details screen showing room details, statistics, consumption, and devices.

projectName: Remove manual Add Room flow, show room icons by selected count, and add dedicated Room Details page navigation
